home.title: Welcome to MechaEngineer
home.subtitle: Innovative mechatronics solutions for the future. Bridging the gap between mechanical, electrical, and software engineering.

background.title: Background
paragraphs: With over a decade of experience in mechatronics engineering, I've developed a passion for creating innovative solutions that seamlessly integrate mechanical, electrical, and software components. My journey began with a degree in Mechanical Engineering, followed by a Master's in Robotics and Automation.
Throughout my career, I've worked on diverse projects ranging from industrial automation systems to cutting-edge robotic applications in healthcare and aerospace industries.

projects.title: Autonomous Warehouse Robot
projects.description: Developed an AI-powered robot for efficient inventory management and order fulfillment in large warehouses.

projects.title: Smart Prosthetic Arm
projects.description: Designed a neural network-controlled prosthetic arm with advanced sensory feedback for improved user experience.

projects.title: Automated Vertical Farming System
projects.description: Created an IoT-based vertical farming solution for urban agriculture, optimizing plant growth and resource usage.

services.title: Mechatronic System Design
services.description: Custom design and integration of mechanical, electrical, and software components for innovative solutions.

services.title: Robotics Consulting
services.description: Expert advice on robotics implementation, from concept to deployment, tailored to your specific needs.

services.title: Automation Solutions
services.description: Development of automated systems to improve efficiency and productivity in various industries.

services.title: IoT Integration
services.description: Seamless integration of IoT technologies into existing systems or new product development.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.successMessage: Thank you for your message! I will get back to you soon.
